name: FruitOS
description:
This game is made for BASIC Dialects Jam #2 (●'◡'●)

Current version: Alpha (still have some bugs and some features are not available, but still playable)

Since I didn't have enough time, this game has a lot of unfinished parts, I will update after the Jam is over (*/ω＼*)

Features:

+ Save your game

+ Get some fruit resources

+ Selling your fruit to Buyer

+ Deposit and withdraw money at the bank with an upgradeable interest rate

+ Play mini-games to earn money (the current version has only 2 mini-games)

+ Challenge to win the game in the shortest time (in days)

+ Goal: Unlock the infinity fruit stones to rescue the world.

------------------------------------------------------------------

Coming soon features:

+ Chat with the Silly Buyer.

+ Music box.

+ Send emails to me LOL.

+ More mini-games.

I will be very happy if you give feedback about my game ☜(ﾟヮﾟ☜)

Have fun! (❁´◡`❁)

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

I got a list of the bugs Iziminza reported to me. Thank you, Iziminza ❤️ I would like to correct it:

  • "In the Gambling -> Even & Odd screen, you cannot change the amount you bet." -> This mini-game will generate a random number less than or equal to the amount you have, and you will have to guess whether the random number is even or odd. If you guess correctly, your money will increase by that random number, if wrong, you lose money.
  • "In the Gambling menu, the two bottom entries do not work." -> These two mini-games are coming soon in the next version.
  • "If you want to buy fruit and enter 300$ into the unlabelled box, you have 0300$ apples and cannot sell any." -> This is really a bug. But the text box in this section does not accept the amount of money, it only accepts the number of fruits you want to buy. And you can only enter numbers in the text box, not the '$' character.
  • "The silly buyers often want to buy huge amounts of fruit that you cannot afford to buy or have." -> So you have to play mini-games to earn money and get enough fruit to sell to the Buyer.
  • "If you restart the game, the interest rate stays the same, so you can spend all your money to move it up and then restart. Repeat this to get arbitrarily large interest rates."  -> This is a bug.
  • "If you restart the game while on the bank screen, only parts of it are removed." -> This is a bug.
  • "When you sell fruit, they do not disappear." -> This is a bug.

I will fix them in the next update ☆*: .｡. o(≧▽≦)o .｡.:*☆
